description:
With the ice melting beneath his feet, Luffy begins a desperate final charge towards his soon-to-be-executed brother. Should his rescue attempt fail, death will surely embrace them both!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Execution Order Issued! Break Through the Encircling Walls!
La sentence va s`abattre. Il faut forcer le mur d`encerclement !
Shokei Shikkou Shirei Kudaru: Houiheki o Toppa Seyo!
Приказ казнить отдан! Прорыв сквозь осадное кольцо!
تمّ إصدار أمر الإعدام! اختراق الجدران المطوّقة!
処刑執行指令下る 包囲壁を突破せよ!
